answers.answer: Hi, get your urine tested, maybe it is urinary tract infection. A course of antibiotic will relieve the symptoms. Get yourself tested for diabetes too. Avoid fluids intake before going to bed.

question: i am female 18,i have severe problem of need to urinate frequently at night,though i do not urinate,but i have the sensation of urinating during nights,and i urge to urinate in the morning as soon as i wake up,but the flow of urine of normal i.e continuos,only problem i have is during night to urinate though i do not micturate,i only think that it is my phsycological feeling but ,but.can you please suggest me what problem do i have .
title: frequent urination
